short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download public videos and images from Instagram™ in few seconds easily. It allows you to download any instagram photo or video.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download public videos and images from Instagram in few seconds easily.
It allows you to download any instagram photo or video. 
You don't have to login to instagram to save photos, just copy the url from instagram and paste it in the input box and thats it.
You can easily open this downloader by clicking the Chrome extension button.
